_comment: Pearl Environment Variable Handling: Variables prefixed with CONNECTION_CONFIGS_CONFIG_ take precedence over non-prefixed versions. This provides backward compatibility while supporting Pearl's prefixing convention. Environment variables are cached by the application for performance.
name: Quorum AI Agent
description: Autonomous DAO voting agent with AI-powered decision making

env_variables.name: OPENROUTER_API_KEY
env_variables.description: API key for OpenRouter AI service

env_variables.name: CONNECTION_CONFIGS_CONFIG_OPENROUTER_API_KEY
env_variables.description: OpenRouter API key for AI services (prefixed, takes precedence over OPENROUTER_API_KEY)

env_variables.name: CONNECTION_CONFIGS_CONFIG_SNAPSHOT_API_KEY
env_variables.description: Snapshot API key for enhanced rate limits (prefixed, takes precedence over SNAPSHOT_API_KEY)

env_variables.name: CONNECTION_CONFIGS_CONFIG_VOTING_STRATEGY
env_variables.description: Voting strategy: balanced, conservative, or aggressive (prefixed, takes precedence over VOTING_STRATEGY)

env_variables.name: CONNECTION_CONFIGS_CONFIG_DAO_ADDRESSES
env_variables.description: Comma-separated list of DAO addresses to monitor (prefixed, takes precedence over DAO_ADDRESSES)
